Package com.objetdirect.tatami.client.gfx

Interface Summary
GraphicObjectListener  
 

Class Summary
Circle A circle graphic component.
Color Represents a color
Ellipse Represents an Ellipse object.
Font Represent a Font for text object TODO fix this class :
GraphicCanvas TODO fix the bug when the original size of the canvas is set to zero.
GraphicObject This is the abstract class to represent a shape object in the gfx package.
ImageGfx Represents a GFX image.
Line This line is constructed with 2 points
Path Paths represent the outline of a shape which can be filled, stroked, used as a clipping path, or any combination of the three.
Pattern A pattern is an image which is used to fill a GraphicalOject.
Point Represents a point in a 2D graphic environement A point has two coordinates (integer) : x and y
Polyline The Polyline component permits to create complex shape from an array of Point.
Rect A Rectangle graphic component.
Rectangle A Rectangle specifies an area in a coordinate space that is enclosed by the Rectangle object's top-left point (x, y) in the coordinate space, its width, and its height.
RectangularShape  
Text Represents some text in a graphical environment.
TextPath TODO : fix the bug : decoration doesn't work even in pure JavaSript
VirtualGroup This call permits to gather some GraphicObject So when a transformation is executing, the tranformation will be applied on all of the GraphicObject contained in the VirtualGroup.
